an3.26:4.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:4.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:4.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:4.6: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hīno hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:4.8: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā.
an3.26:5.1: * Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:5.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:5.5: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ sīlakathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
an3.26:5.6: Samādhisāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ samādhikathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
an3.26:5.7: Paññāsāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ paññākathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti.
an3.26:5.8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:6.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:6.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:6.5: Iti aparipūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:6.6: aparipūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:6.7: aparipūraṃ vā paññākkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā paññākkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti.
an3.26:6.8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:6.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasminti.
